Functions to test for file types

Source: R/file_system.R
file_type.Rd

Test for file types

Usage

s3_is_file(path)

s3_is_dir(path)

s3_is_bucket(path, ...)

s3_is_file_empty(path)

Arguments

path

(character): A character vector of paths or uris

...

parameters to be passed to s3_list_objects_v2
